CommandDefinition.Name: listfilters
CommandDefinition.Description: Lists all filters, their deployment status and the trigger they are deployed on.

BoolOption.Name: e
BoolOption.Description: Print stacktrace information in the case of errors.

BoolOption.Name: o
BoolOption.Description: Prints in old format, option e is recognized.

BoolOption.Name: c
BoolOption.Description: Print informations for instance configuration parameters.

BoolOption.Name: r
BoolOption.Description: Orders by runtime context name instead of filter name.
